description: WorkSource DeKalb is hosting a two-day event to help get local youths ready for work.
title: Does your kid need a job? This DeKalb event can help
title_page: Does your kid need a job? This DeKalb event can help
text:
WorkSource DeKalb is hosting a two-day event to help get local youths ready for work.
On April 3 and 4, from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m., the young people will have access to free workshops on resume writing, dressing for work, effective communication and entrepreneurship.
Attendees also can participate in a job fair and get assistance researching scholarships.
Space is limited. Register online to reserve a spot at www.bit.do/youthrock.
The location is Georgia Piedmont Technical College Conference Center, 495 North Indian Creek Road, Clarkston.
For more information, contact WorkSource DeKalb at 404-687-3400.
